page.title: 11Home Life
page.content: In our survey we discovered that the majority of houses in the area used gas as the major form of heating however in the more remote parts electricity is the only form of energy available. Every family in our survey had a washing machine and 90% had either a fridge or fridge/freezer. Several families had additional facilities such as tumble driers or microwave ovens. In 67% of all households there were 4 people living in the house. 27% of all households had 3 people living in the house. 4% had 5 and 2% had 6. There were no houses containing 1 or 2 people however we suspect there are. Pets proved to be popular with 80% of our families. Budgies, cats and dogs being the three most popular choices. With our families a roast Sunday dinner was easily the favourite dish.
